file_content.text: Begone. I have finished with you.
What is this in front of me? Another worshipper?
Who braves the flames of the Altar of Horror to stand in front of Lord Barel-Slathborn, Lord of the Sith?
Captain Medle sent me to find you, Commander.
Commander Gargun?
There is no "commander" here--and if there were, he would be my minion. Imperials serve the Sith Lords!
This tomb has driven you insane, "lord."
So you're crazy.
Insane? No. Do not seek madness, but fear and hatred, the tools of the Sith!
Hope you don't mind if I shoot you now.
Whatever you say. [Attack]
If you're not an Imperial commander, then what's that ID card for?
You're confused.
What madness do you speak? I have no... ah, that.
It seems the ID of some Imperial commander I must have slain has stuck to my robes.
Do you wish to have it? A token of your visit with the great Lord Barel-Slathborn?
That works for me.
Sure.
Oh, thank you, my lord! That's very generous of you.
I'd be honored.
It is settled, then. A token for you. Go forth now and spread word to all who worship lesser lords.
Lord Barel-Slathborn is mightiest among all mighty Lords of the Sith!
I'm afraid this job calls for you being dead.
Orders say you die. [Attack]
Where's your lightsaber, my lord? Don't you feel naked without it?
You don't look like a Sith.
Insolence! You will perish in flames!
I don't like crazy people--except when they're dead.
Time to die. [Attack]
To me, my disciples!
Fear me!
